data.name: A.R.M.: Absolutely Reliable Machine
data.detailed_description:
A.R.M. is a 2D action game focused on concentrated battle without moving. Take inevitable competition against fearsome monsters that want to destroy our world!

Synopsis

Our World is in danger! Suddenly fearsome monsters started to invade our world! Every trying to resist was useless and the history of the war was continuous of fail and retreat.


But we found a way. We always have. With the sacrifice of brave heroes and the effort of brilliant genius, The moment of counterattack has finally come!

A.R.M. is the only hope to save the world! Arm up with this Absolutely Reliable Machine and Save the World!

Features

  • Enjoy a thrilling and tactical battle with simple action!


  • Each Monster uses his own tactics with his advantage. Analyze the enemy and target weaknesses!


  • Don't forget to upgrade your A.R.M.! Cover your weakness, enhance advantage and learn new skills!

Secret Features

  • Experience Origin of A.R.M.! Face the cruel battle with a totally different combat style!
  • Various challenges. Can you win without being hit by a monster? Can you seal a powerful smash and defeat the monster? Fight against the monsters with special conditions and achieve various challenges!
  • Challenging to new extreme difficulty. Life is only one and all acts follow responsibility. Become a real A.R.M.!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Any processor w/ a clock rate of 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

data.legal_notice: A.R.M.: Absolutely Reliable Machine © 2020 Nevertheless Studio. All rights reserved. Distributed by PsychoFlux Entertainment.
